trans-unit.source: A component that accepts channels and associates them with a service.
trans-unit.target: Um componente que aceita canais e associa-las um serviço.

trans-unit.source: A ChannelDispatcher object associates an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener> at a particular URI (called a listen URI) with an instance of a service.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de ChannelDispatcher associa um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener>um URI específico (denominado um URI de escuta) com uma instância de um serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> object can have many ChannelDispatcher objects, each associated with a different listener and listen URI for that service.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>objecto pode ter muitos objetos de ChannelDispatcher, cada um associado um serviço de escuta diferentes e URI de escuta para esse serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: When a message arrives, the ChannelDispatcher queries each of the associated <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher> objects whether the endpoint can accept the message, and passes the message to the one that can.
trans-unit.target: Quando chega uma mensagem, o ChannelDispatcher consulta cada um associado <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>objetos se o ponto final pode aceitar a mensagem e passa a mensagem para um que possível</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher> object is responsible for processing messages from a ChannelDispatcher when the destination address of a message matches the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher.AddressFilter%2A> property and the message action matches the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher.ContractFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>objeto é responsável por processar mensagens de um ChannelDispatcher quando o endereço de destino de uma mensagem corresponde a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher.AddressFilter%2A>propriedade e correspondências de ação de mensagem a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher.ContractFilter%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher.ContractFilter%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher.AddressFilter%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: All properties that control the lifetime and behavior of a channel session are available for inspection or modification on the ChannelDispatcher object.
trans-unit.target: Todas as propriedades que controlam a duração e o comportamento de uma sessão de canal estão disponíveis para inspeção ou modificação no objeto de ChannelDispatcher.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>, these include custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IChannelInitializer> objects, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener>, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>, the associated and <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>.
trans-unit.target: Para além de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>, incluem personalizada <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IChannelInitializer>objetos, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener>, a <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>, a <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> e associados</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IChannelInitializer> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> class from the provided listener, with system-provided default timeouts.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>classe a partir do serviço de escuta fornecido, com tempos limite de predefinição fornecidos pelo sistema.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"></xref> for the channel dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"> </xref> para o emissor de canal.

trans-unit.source: listener is .
trans-unit.target: listeneris .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> class from the provided listener and binding, with system-provided default timeouts.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>classe do serviço de escuta fornecido e enlace, com tempos limite de predefinição fornecidos pelo sistema.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"></xref> for the channel dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"> </xref> para o emissor de canal.

trans-unit.source: The name of the binding used to configure the service.
trans-unit.target: O nome do enlace utilizado para configurar o serviço.

trans-unit.source: listener is .
trans-unit.target: listeneris .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> class from the provided listener and binding, with the specified default timeouts.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>classe do serviço de escuta fornecido e enlace, com os tempos limite predefinido especificado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"></xref> for the service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"> </xref> para o serviço.

trans-unit.source: The name of the binding used to configure the service.
trans-unit.target: O nome do enlace utilizado para configurar o serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts> for the service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts>para o serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts>

trans-unit.source: listener is .
trans-unit.target: listeneris .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the transacted accept method calls on listener are asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o transacionadas aceitam chamadas de método no serviço de escuta são assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the transacted accept method calls on listener are asynchronous; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>se aceitam o transacionadas chama o método no serviço de escuta são assíncronas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Attaches the channel dispatcher to the host.
trans-unit.target: Anexa o distribuidor de canal para o anfitrião.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está a ser o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado, que é o estado apenas mutável e não é eliminado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase"></xref> for the service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase"> </xref> para o serviço.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the binding used to configure the service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do enlace utilizado para configurar o serviço.

trans-unit.source: Used to obtain the binding name for the binding with which this channel dispatcher is associated.
trans-unit.target: Utilizado para obter o nome do enlace para o enlace com a qual está associado a este emissor de canal.

trans-unit.source: The binding name of the service.
trans-unit.target: O nome do enlace do serviço.

trans-unit.source: Gets a set of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IChannelInitializer"></xref> objects that you can use to inspect and add state to channels when they are first created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um conjunto de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IChannelInitializer"> </xref> objetos que pode utilizar para inspecionar e adicionar o estado de canais quando forem criados pela primeira vez.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to insert a custom channel initializer into the initialization collection to inspect or modify channel state when they are created.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para inserir um inicializador de canal personalizado na coleção de inicialização para inspecionar ou modificar o estado de canal quando forem criados.

trans-unit.source: This is also useful to perform the same behavior on outgoing channels if the contract associated with a dispatcher is a duplex contract.
trans-unit.target: Isto também é útil para executar o mesmo comportamento em canais de saída, se o contrato associado com um dispatcher é um contrato duplex.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IChannelInitializer"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601> do tipo <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IChannelInitializer"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Stops the listener from accepting new channels.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe o serviço de escuta de aceitar novos canais.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method stops the listener listening.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método interrompe o serviço de escuta à escuta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default interval of time allowed for the channel dispatcher to close.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o intervalo predefinido de tempo permitido para o emissor de canal fechar.

trans-unit.source: This default close timeout can be set using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>.
trans-unit.target: Este limite de tempo de fechar predefinido pode ser definido utilizando <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a service model default value of 1 minute is used.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, é utilizado um valor de predefinido do modelo de serviço de 1 minuto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the default interval of time allowed for the channel dispatcher to close.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.TimeSpan>que especifica o intervalo predefinido de tempo permitido para o emissor de canal fechar.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets the default interval of time allowed for the channel dispatcher to open.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o intervalo predefinido de tempo permitido para o emissor de canal abrir.

trans-unit.source: This default open timeout can be set using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>.
trans-unit.target: Este limite de tempo de abrir predefinido pode ser definido utilizando <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a service model default value of 1 minute is used.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, é utilizado um valor de predefinido do modelo de serviço de 1 minuto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the default interval of time allowed for the channel dispatcher to close.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.TimeSpan>que especifica o intervalo predefinido de tempo permitido para o emissor de canal fechar.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Detaches the service host from the channel dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Desanexa o anfitrião do serviço do distribuidor de canal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> can only be detached when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>só pode ser desligado quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está a ser o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado, que é o estado apenas mutável e não é eliminado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> associated with the channel dispatcher to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>associadas com o distribuidor de canal para `null`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase"></xref> for the service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase"> </xref> para o serviço.

trans-unit.source: host is .
trans-unit.target: hostis .

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the endpoint dispatchers which forward messages to the channel endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os dispatchers de ponto final que reencaminhar mensagens para os pontos finais de canal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> has a distinct <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher> for each endpoint that the channel can support.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>tem um distintos <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>para cada ponto final que consiga suportar o canal.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher> to obtain access to runtime properties that enable you to customize the runtime across an entire endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>para obter acesso às propriedades do tempo de execução que lhe permite personalizar o tempo de execução através de um ponto final de todo.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601> of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher> which forward messages to the channel endpoints.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601> de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>que reencaminhar mensagens para os pontos finais de canal.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Gets a set of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IErrorHandler"></xref> objects that can be used to insert custom error handling functionality for an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um conjunto de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IErrorHandler"> </xref> objetos que podem ser utilizados para inserir a funcionalidade de para um ponto final de processamento de erros personalizados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601> of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IErrorHandler"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601> de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IErrorHandler"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the host for the service associated with the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o anfitrião para o serviço associado o dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> object can have many <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> objects, each associated with a different <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener> for that service.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>objecto pode ter muitos <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>objetos, cada um associado com outra <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener>relativamente a esse serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase"></xref> for the service associated with the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase"> </xref> para o serviço associado o dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the details about an exception in a fault.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve incluir os detalhes sobre uma exceção numa falha.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está a ser o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado, que é o estado apenas mutável e não é eliminado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the details about an exception are included in the faults; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>os detalhes sobre uma exceção no caso de falhas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the accept method calls on the listener are done under a transaction.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as chamadas de método de aceitar o serviço de escuta de terminar com uma transação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the accept method calls on the listener are done under a transaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as chamadas de método de aceitar o serviço de escuta de terminar com uma transação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the receive method calls on the listener are done under a transaction.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as chamadas de método receive o serviço de escuta de terminar com uma transação.

trans-unit.source: The IsTransactedReceive property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Só pode ser definida a propriedade IsTransactedReceive quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está a ser o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado, que é o estado apenas mutável e não é eliminado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the receive method calls on the listener are done under a transaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o método receive chama o serviço de escuta de terminar com uma transação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the listener associated with the channel dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o serviço de escuta associado o distribuidor de canal.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> associates an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener> at a particular URI with an instance of a service.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>associa um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener>um URI específico com uma instância de um serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"></xref> associated with the channel dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"> </xref> associadas com o distribuidor de canal.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the channel dispatcher adds addressing headers to request-reply messages.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o distribuidor de canal adiciona o endereçamento de cabeçalhos para mensagens de pedido-resposta.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está a ser o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado, que é o estado apenas mutável e não é eliminado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime.ManualAddressing%2A> property to `true` if you want to prevent the client from adding Message ID and ReplyTo addressing headers to request/response messages so that your application can control these headers.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime.ManualAddressing%2A>propriedade `true` se pretender impedir que o cliente Adicionar ID de mensagem e ReplyTo endereçamento cabeçalhos de mensagens de pedido/resposta para que a aplicação pode controlar estes cabeçalhos.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime.ManualAddressing%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the proxy does not add any addressing headers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o proxy não adiciona quaisquer cabeçalhos endereçamento; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Consulte observações.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum pending messages per channel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número máximo de mensagens pendentes por canal.

trans-unit.source: An integer representing a maximum number of messages.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro que representa um número máximo de mensagens.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size for a transacted batch.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho máximo para um lote transacionado.

trans-unit.source: The MaxTransactedBatchSize property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Só pode ser definida a propriedade MaxTransactedBatchSize quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está a ser o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado, que é o estado apenas mutável e não é eliminado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The maximum size for a transacted batch.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho máximo para um lote transacionado.

trans-unit.source: The value set is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de valor é menor do que zero.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SOAP message and WS-Addressing versions that are used or expected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a mensagem SOAP e as versões de WS-Addressing que são utilizadas ou esperadas.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the versions of SOAP and WS-Addressing associated with a message and its exchange.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que as versões do SOAP e WS-Addressing associadas a uma mensagem e o exchange.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está a ser o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado, que é o estado apenas mutável e não é eliminado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> that is used or expected.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>que é utilizado ou esperado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Aborts the listener associated with the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe o serviço de escuta associado o dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a channel listener for the dispatcher that must be completed within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: Começa uma operação assíncrona para fechar um serviço de escuta de canal para o emissor tem de ser concluído dentro de um intervalo de tempo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the close operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.TimeSpan>que especifica o período de tempo a operação de fecho seja concluída antes de exceder o tempo limite.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous completion of the close operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegado que recebe a notificação da conclusão da operação de fechada assíncrona.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto, especificado pela aplicação, que contém informações de estado associadas a operação de fecho assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous operation to close a channel listener for the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IAsyncResult>que referencia a operação assíncrona para fechar um serviço de escuta de canal para o dispatcher.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to open a channel listener for the dispatcher that must be completed within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: Começa uma operação assíncrona para abrir um serviço de escuta de canal para o emissor tem de ser concluído dentro de um intervalo de tempo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The channel dispatcher must be associated with a non-`null` service host when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: O dispatcher canal tem de ser associado um não -`null` anfitrião do serviço quando este método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the open operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.TimeSpan>que especifica o período de tempo a operação de abertura seja concluída antes de exceder o tempo limite.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous completion of the open operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegado que recebe a notificação da conclusão assíncrona da operação de abertura.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto, especificado pela aplicação, que contém informações de estado associadas a operação de abertura assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous operation to open a channel listener for the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IAsyncResult>que referencia a operação assíncrona para abrir um serviço de escuta de canal para o dispatcher.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The host or the message version is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O anfitrião ou a versão da mensagem é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Closes the channel listener associated with the dispatcher within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: Fecha o serviço de escuta de canal associado o dispatcher dentro de um intervalo de tempo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the interval of time allowed for the listener to close.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.TimeSpan>que especifica o intervalo de tempo permitido para o serviço de escuta fechar.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Provides a trace of the closing of the endpoint dispatchers associated with the channel dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um rastreio de fecho de dispatchers o ponto final associado o distribuidor de canal.

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to close a channel listener for the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Concluir uma operação assíncrona para fechar um serviço de escuta de canal para o distribuidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by a call to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.OnBeginClose*> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IAsyncResult>devolvido por uma chamada para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.OnBeginClose*>método.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.OnBeginClose*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to open a channel listener for the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Concluir uma operação assíncrona para abrir um serviço de escuta de canal para o distribuidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by a call to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.OnBeginOpen*> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IAsyncResult>devolvido por uma chamada para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.OnBeginOpen*>método.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.OnBeginOpen*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Opens the listener associated with the channel dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Abre-se o serviço de escuta associado o distribuidor de canal.

trans-unit.source: The channel dispatcher must be associated with a non-`null` service host when this method is called and message version must be set to a non-`null` value.
trans-unit.target: O dispatcher canal tem de ser associado um não -`null` anfitrião do serviço quando este método é denominado e versão de mensagem tem de ser definido para um não -`null` valor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the interval of time allowed for the listener to open.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.TimeSpan>que especifica o intervalo de tempo permitido para o serviço de escuta abrir.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The host or the message version is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O anfitrião ou a versão da mensagem é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Populates and validates filter table used to dispatch to the endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Preenche e valida a tabela de filtro utilizada para emitir para os pontos finais.

trans-unit.source: The channel dispatcher must be associated with a non-`null` service host when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: O dispatcher canal tem de ser associado um não -`null` anfitrião do serviço quando este método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: The host is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O anfitrião está <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the channel dispatcher is attached to a host.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o distribuidor de canal está ligado a um anfitrião.

trans-unit.source: The channel dispatcher must be associated with a non-`null` service host on opening.
trans-unit.target: O dispatcher canal tem de ser associado um não -`null` anfitrião do serviço de abertura.

trans-unit.source: The host is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O anfitrião está <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether ReceiveContext is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se ReceiveContext está ativado.

trans-unit.source: The ReceiveContext controls the manner in which messages are handled by the service, for example locking of the message as long as needed.
trans-unit.target: O ReceiveContext controla a forma no qual as mensagens são processadas pelo serviço, por exemplo bloqueio da mensagem desde conforme necessário.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if ReceiveContext is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiver ativada ReceiveContext; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the dispatcher uses synchronous calls to read messages from channels.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se o distribuidor utiliza chamadas síncronas para ler mensagens a partir dos canais.

trans-unit.source: If a binding implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences>, [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] assigns the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property to this property.
trans-unit.target: Se um enlace implementa <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences>, [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] atribui o valor da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>propriedade para esta propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences>

trans-unit.source: So if this value is `true`, the `false` default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> is overridden.
trans-unit.target: Por isso, caso este valor é `true`, a `false` valor de predefinido <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>seja substituída.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está a ser o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado, que é o estado apenas mutável e não é eliminado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the dispatcher uses synchronous methods to read messages from channels; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o distribuidor utilizar métodos síncronos para ler mensagens de canais; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether messages are sent asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se as mensagens são enviadas de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if messages are sent asynchronously; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as mensagens são enviadas de forma assíncrona; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the service throttle for the service associated with the channel dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a limitação de serviço para o serviço associado o distribuidor de canal.

trans-unit.source: This provides access to the controls used to optimize the availability and performance of a service.
trans-unit.target: Isto fornece acesso aos controlos utilizada para otimizar a disponibilidade e desempenho de um serviço.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está a ser o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado, que é o estado apenas mutável e não é eliminado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default isolation level for transactions.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nível de isolamento predefinido para transações.

trans-unit.source: Use the TransactionIsolationLevel property to get or set the default isolation level for new transactions created by the dispatcher for the service.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de TransactionIsolationLevel obter ou definir o nível de isolamento de predefinição para novas transações criadas pelo distribuidor para o serviço.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está a ser o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado, que é o estado apenas mutável e não é eliminado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The isolation level set is not defined.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de nível de isolamento não está definido.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the default timeout for new transactions created by the dispatcher on behalf of the service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica o tempo limite predefinido para novas transações criadas pelo dispatcher em nome do serviço.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está a ser o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado, que é o estado apenas mutável e não é eliminado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> value that represents the default timeout period for transactions.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.TimeSpan>valor que representa o período de tempo limite predefinido para transações.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref:System.TimeSpan>.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The value set is less than zero or is too large.
trans-unit.target: O valor definido é inferior a zero ou é demasiado grande.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está a ser um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>Estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>
